summary: Adds Beavers and Raccoons along the Streams/Rivers/Lakes of Skyrim, and around
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff0000][b][size=4]Beavers and Raccoons of Skyrim[/size][/b][/color] [color=#00ff00]version 1.1[/color]

[color=#00ff00]Optional File: Esp version Fr.[/color]


Adds Beavers and Raccoons along the Streams/Rivers/Lakes of Skyrim, and around: Wild + Companions/Followers

[img]https://i.imgur.com/dU9zKkx.gif[/img]


[color=#ff0000][b]WILD[/b][/color]

38 Beavers + 24 Raccoons

[color=#ff0000][b]COMPANIONS[/b][/color]

16 Beavers + 12 Raccoons

You can talk: Wait - Follow - Trade - Favor - Dismiss, with these pets

You can only have one follower at a time: if you want a different one, you need to dismiss the first one before you recruit them.

If you have any problem with the dialog box, or if telling the follower to return at home doesn't dismiss him, or if you have lost the active follower, you can try this:

Type “²” or "`" or "~" key to get into console, and type:

set playeranimalcount to 0

With Amazing Follower Tweaks , or other mod with followers, if problem to dismiss the followers, you can uncheck this mod (AFT or other) when you launch the game

If problem with the Dialog Box of the followers/ companions (Wait - Follow - Trade - Favor - Dismiss) you can also enter / exit a house or make a fast travel


[color=#ff0000]Credits[/color]

[color=#ff0000] gothic2392/ 530gothic25 [/color] for the meshes/textures of Beaver, Raccoon, in his mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37999/?] Skyrim Wildlife Overhaul [/url] (“give me credit at least”)

Free sounds for the followers


[color=#ff0000]Video with the Raccoon[/color]

->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->[youtube]jPC0zjM-RZQ[/youtube]<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-
